definition: gathered for protruding fullness, forceful exhalation through the nose or mouth, breathe noisily, as when one is exhausted
details:
adjective
- gathered for protruding fullness
= example: gathered for protruding fullness
= synonyms: puffed
noun
- forceful exhalation through the nose or mouth
= synonyms: blow
- a slow inhalation, as of tobacco smoke
= example: a slow inhalation, as of tobacco smoke
= synonyms: pull
- thick cushion used as a seat
= synonyms: ottoman, hassock, pouf, pouffe
- a soft spherical object made from fluffy fibers
= synonyms: powderpuff
- bedding made of two layers of cloth filled with stuffing and stitched together
= synonyms: comfort
- exaggerated praise (as for promotional purposes)
- a light inflated pastry or puff shell
- a short light gust of air
= synonyms: whiff
verb
- breathe noisily, as when one is exhausted
= synonyms: heave
- blow hard and loudly
= example: blow hard and loudly
= synonyms: huff, chuff
- to swell or cause to enlarge, 'Her faced puffed up from the drugs'
= example: to swell or cause to enlarge, 'Her faced puffed up from the drugs'
= synonyms: puff up, puff out
- speak in a blustering or scornful manner
= example: speak in a blustering or scornful manner
- praise extravagantly
= example: praise extravagantly
= synonyms: puff up
- smoke and exhale strongly
= example: smoke and exhale strongly
= synonyms: whiff
- suck in or take (air)
= synonyms: drag
- make proud or conceited
= example: make proud or conceited
